snippet: The iPhone and other mobile phones include tools and settings to help people with hearing loss....

headline.main: Seavey Chases Elusive 5th Title as Iditarod Starts Saturday
headline.print_headline: Seavey Chases Elusive 5th Title as Iditarod Starts Saturday

lead_paragraph: The iPhone and other mobile phones include tools and settings to help people with hearing loss.
